text: Jwapakuotola manimmeka abe nng'omba mu nyumba ja Nnoongo jwango. Abokaje mweno ngu. Uyo maniandika kwakwe liina lya Nnoongo jwango na liina lya kilambo cha Nnoongo jwango, yani Yelusalemu nnyono, kilambo chenie kiuluka kuboka kumbengu kwa Nnoongo jwango. Uyo panani jakwe niandika liina lyango lihyono.
